name: Low Memory
solution: Add more StorageServer (SS) roles or increase memory limits on SS processes.

name: High Latency
solution: Scale proxies/GRV proxies; check network hotspots; increase concurrency limits.

name: Disk Full
solution: Add or rebalance storage nodes; expand volume; run data movement to relieve hot shards.

name: Version Lag
solution: Add TLogs or resolvers; investigate slow disks/network causing replication backlog.

name: Coordinator Unhealthy
solution: Replace/restart failed coordinators; verify network routes and cluster file correctness.
